Test Piece Contest
Stanley in Africa
Stanion, Northants 3rd Annual Contest organised by Stanion Jubilee Brass Band Reported in Northampton Herald, 11th July 1891 Quickstep: 1. Kettering, 2. Desborough Prizes: £3 and 12 guinea cornet, £2 and 11 guinea baritone, 10 guinea tenor horn, 7 guinea flugel horn, 5 guinea trombone. 5 bands competed
June 16, 2012, 3:26 p.m. Nov. 17, 2017, 9:56 p.m.
